info.title: Global Trade and Supply Chain - Test Endpoints
info.description: REST API for Global Trade and Supply Chain - Test Endpoints.

tags.name: Blob Storage
tags.description: Endpoints which are modelled to access a blob storage contract.

post.summary: Create a blob in to storage

requestBody.description: Request to create an entry in blob storage.

201.description: The rest request ended in created response.

400.description: The server cannot process the request, see the error field for more details.

401.description: You are not authorized to use the API or no credentials were supplied, see the error field for more details.

500.description: The server has encountered a situation it does not know how to handle, see the error field for more details.

get.summary: Get the blob metadata from storage

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the blob to get in urn format.

parameters.name: includeContent
parameters.description: Include the content in the response, otherwise only metadata is returned.

200.description: Response to get an entry from blob storage.

400.description: The server cannot process the request, see the error field for more details.

401.description: You are not authorized to use the API or no credentials were supplied, see the error field for more details.

404.description: The resource you tried to access does not exist, see the error field for more details.

500.description: The server has encountered a situation it does not know how to handle, see the error field for more details.

put.summary: Update a blob metadata in storage

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the blob to get in urn format.

requestBody.description: Request to update a blob entry.

204.description: The rest request ended in success with no data.

400.description: The server cannot process the request, see the error field for more details.

401.description: You are not authorized to use the API or no credentials were supplied, see the error field for more details.

500.description: The server has encountered a situation it does not know how to handle, see the error field for more details.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the blob to remove in urn format.

204.description: The rest request ended in success with no data.

400.description: The server cannot process the request, see the error field for more details.

404.description: The resource you tried to access does not exist, see the error field for more details.

500.description: The server has encountered a situation it does not know how to handle, see the error field for more details.

200.description: The content of the blob, which will be a specific mime type if one can be detected from the content (or set as mimeType in the metadata), or defaults to application/octet-stream.

400.description: The server cannot process the request, see the error field for more details.

401.description: You are not authorized to use the API or no credentials were supplied, see the error field for more details.

404.description: The resource you tried to access does not exist, see the error field for more details.

500.description: The server has encountered a situation it does not know how to handle, see the error field for more details.

properties.description: Any additional information for the error.

stack.description: The stack trace for the error.

notFoundId.description: The id if the item that was not found.

properties.description: Any additional information for the error.

stack.description: The stack trace for the error.

NotFoundResponse.description: The body which contains the error.

blob.description: The data to store in base64 encoding.

mimeType.description: The mime type of the blob, will be detected if left undefined.

extension.description: The extension of the blob, will be detected if left undefined.

namespace.description: The namespace to store the data in, defaults to component configured namespace.

JsonLdDocument.description: A JSON-LD document MUST be valid JSON text as described in [RFC8259], or some format that can be represented in the JSON-LD internal representation that is equivalent to valid JSON text.

NodeObject.description: A node object represents zero or more properties of a node in the graph serialized by the JSON-LD document.

ContextDefinition.description: A context definition defines a local context in a node object.

Keyword.description: A list of keywords and their types. Only used for internal reference; not an actual interface. Not for export.

ValueObject.description: A value object is used to explicitly associate a type or a language with a value to create a typed value or a language-tagged string and possibly associate a base direction.

IncludedBlock.description: An included block is used to provide a set of node objects.

ListOrSetItem.description: A list or set item can be a null, boolean, number, string, node object, or value object.

ExpandedTermDefinition.description: An expanded term definition is used to describe the mapping between a term and its expanded identifier, as well as other properties of the value associated with the term when it is used as key in a node object.

GraphObject.description: A graph object represents a named graph, which MAY include an explicit graph name.

ListObject.description: A list represents an ordered set of values.

SetObject.description: A set represents an unordered set of values.

LanguageMap.description: A language map is used to associate a language with a value in a way that allows easy programmatic access.

IndexMap.description: An index map allows keys that have no semantic meaning, but should be preserved regardless, to be used in JSON-LD documents.

IndexMapItem.description: The items that can be stored in an index map.

IdMap.description: An id map is used to associate an IRI with a value that allows easy programmatic access.

TypeMap.description: A type map is used to associate an IRI with a value that allows easy programmatic access.

mimeType.description: The mime type of the blob.

blob.description: The blob in base64 format, if the includeContent flag was set in the request.

mimeType.description: The mime type of the blob, will be detected if left undefined.

extension.description: The extension of the blob, will be detected if left undefined.
